name: 賀一平
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation
Week 2: Tourism and Hospitality English
Week 3: Tourism and Hospitality English
Week 4: The Power of Beauty in Advertising
Week 5: For Women's Sake, Let's Close the Gap Between Ads and Reality
Week 6: We All Need Role Models to Motivate and Inspires Us
Week 7: The Problems with Athletes as Role Models
Week 8:  Review
Week 9: Mid-term Exam; General English Proficiency Test
Week 10: Sentence Patterns and Listening Comprehension
Week 11: Sentence Patterns and Reading Comprehension
Week 12: The Ingredients of a Happy Childhood
Week 13: Failure: The Real Key to Success
Week 14: A Real Cure for Insomnia
Week 15: How I learned to Stop Apologizing for Being Vegetarian
Week 16:  Tourism and Hospitality English
Week 17:  Review
Week 18: Final Exam; General English Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Attendance and Assignments: 40%
Mid-term exam: 20%
Final Exam: 20%
General English Proficiency Test: 20%
materials: Anderson, P & Cullen, J. (2015). On point: Reading and critical thinking skills. Compass.
